requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080/AMD 6600 or better, 30xx/6800 or better for best graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Built on UE5, Asurya's Embers is a graphically intense game. Turn visual scalability in settings down to Medium or Low on slower machines. RTX-capable cards required for High or Epic graphics settings.
